item.name: RSRQ
item.description:
Value "<-19.5" of type "string" is not suitable for value type "Numeric (float)"
To handle this, if "<-19.5" is received, it is set to "-20" which is numeric

trigger.name: Fair to poor RSRQ
trigger.description: Fair to poor RSRQ. Recovery when RSRQ is above 14 for 600 seconds (10 minutes)

trigger.name: Very poor RSRQ
trigger.description: Very poor RSRQ. Recovery when RSRQ is above 19 for 600 seconds (10 minutes)

graph.name: SINR Signal to Interference plus Noise Ratio
